target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002630_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ah, suis-je bête<var 1D /var>! Il reste un problème majeurrr<var 1D /var>: où vais-je trouver la main-d'œuvre nécessaire à un tel chantier<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002640_CHAINUZZ<tab>Left to the crew that helped down below, it would take decades, if not a nice round century!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002640_CHAINUZZ<tab>Même si j'appelle tous les gars d'en bas en renfort, ça nous prendrait des mois, voirrre des années<var 1D /var>! Non, non, je vous le dis, c'est impossible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002650_ALISAIE<tab>So we need more hands. And what sort of things would these hands be required to do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002650_ALISAIE<tab>Si ce n'est que ça, on devrait pouvoir s'arranger. Dites-nous juste de quel genre de main-d'œuvre vous avez besoin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002660_CHAINUZZ<tab>Oh? Er... Well, er... Well, let's see... First, we'd need people to procure the stone for the chassis.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002660_CHAINUZZ<tab>Euh... Eh bien... Pour commencer, il me faut des gros bras pour me rapporter des pierres, de quoi façonner le corrrps du talos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002670_CHAINUZZ<tab>The rock found near the mountain would suit our purposes well enough. It'd be a simple task to quarry the stuff, but given the stupendous quantity required, we'd need all the help we can get.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002670_CHAINUZZ<tab>Attention<var 1D /var>: je ne peux travailler que sur de la roche issue des massifs prrroches du Mont Gulg. Il suffit de m'en couper de gros blocs, rien de bien compliqué. Mais il va m'en falloir en quantité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002680_THANCRED<tab>We have friends amongst the miners of Amh Araeng. I will go and petition their aid.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002680_THANCRED<tab>Je vais frapper aux portes des mines d'Amh Araeng. Il devrait y avoir pas mal de volontaires là-bas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002690_ALISAIE<tab>While you do that, I'll make for Mord Souq. I'm sure I'll be able to drum up some support.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002690_ALISAIE<tab>Moi, je vais faire un saut à Mord Souq. Je suis sûre que ses habitants seront ravis de nous donner un coup de main.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002700_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then I shall return to Kholusia.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002700_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dans ce cas, je m'occupe de recruter du monde sur l'île de Kholusia.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002710_ALPHINAUD<tab>From fishers to carpenters, Eulmore is home to all manner of talented folk. I daresay their skills will avail us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002710_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ses pêcheurs et ses charpentiers ont de la force physique à revendre. Eulmore devrait aussi compter un bon nombre d'ouvriers compétents.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002720_RYNE<tab>Is there anything else you need?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002720_RYNE<tab>C'est tout ce qu'il vous fallait<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002730_CHAINUZZ<tab>Well...yes, actually... Magic. Lots of the stuff. As much as possible. To awaken a Talos of this size would require an entire congregation of mages.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002730_CHAINUZZ<tab>Bien sûr que non<var 1D /var>! Il faut aussi une équipe de mages pour mettre en brrranle le colosse. Sans ça, toute cette entreprise tombe à l'eau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002740_YSHTOLA<tab>Many among the Night's Blessed are gifted in the arcane arts. I will recruit them to our cause.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002740_YSHTOLA<tab>Le peuple de la Nuit compte dans ses rangs de nombreux adeptes de la magie. Laissez-moi leur en toucher un mot.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002750_URIANGER<tab>The fae folk too, possess surpassing aptitude in magicks. Yet they are not wont to cooperate in the endeavors of men. Leastwise, not without making all manner of mischief.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002750_URIANGER<tab>On peut aussi penser aux Pixies... mais je les vois mal travailler pour des humains, sans compter qu'il faudrait supporter leurs espiègleries à longueur de journée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002760_URIANGER<tab>That being the case, I would instead call upon the people of the Crystarium─with thy permission, Exarch.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002760_URIANGER<tab>J'aime autant tenter ma chance ailleurs, à Cristarium, par exemple. Si vous n'y voyez pas d'in<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>vé<var 16 /var>nient, bien sûr.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We are at your disposal, as are our amaro and chocobos.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002770_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je vous en prie. Si vous voulez, vous pouvez aussi emprunter nos amaros et nos chocobos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002780_CHAINUZZ<tab>I'm sorry─you mean to tell me you can call on not only the people of Eulmore and the Crystarium, but the Night's Blessed, and the Mord, and even those miners!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002780_CHAINUZZ<tab>Stooop, temps morrrt<var 1D /var>! Dites... Vous êtes sérieux, là<var 1D /var>!? Le peuple de la Nuit, les mineurs d'Amh Araeng, les habitants d'Eulmore et de Cristarium...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002790_CHAINUZZ<tab>But that's just about everyone in bally Norvrandt!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002790_CHAINUZZ<tab>En fait, c'est Norrrvrandt tout entier que vous comptez mettre à con<var 16 /var>tri<var 16 /var>bu<var 16 /var>tion<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002800_CHAINUZZ<tab>Who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you people!? And how did you come to have so many <var 1A 02 /var>friends<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002800_CHAINUZZ<tab>Déjà, comment se fait-il que vous connaissiez autant de monde<var 1D /var>? Vous êtes qui, au juste<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>The saviors of the world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Les sauveurs de ce monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Adventurers of no import.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Des touristes en vadrouille.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>The artist Alphinaud and his assistants.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A5_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Les assistants de maître Alphinaud.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002810_CHAINUZZ<tab>Saviors of the world? Are you being serious? Oh gods, you are...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002810_CHAINUZZ<tab>Euh... Vrrraiment<var 1D /var>? Rien que ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002820_CHAINUZZ<tab>No import? You expect me to believe that after you just promised me the help of the better part of the world!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002820_CHAINUZZ<tab>Vous êtes drrrôlement ambitieux pour des touristes... Ou alors, vous vous payez ma tête<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002830_DULIACHAI<tab>Oh, dearest, have you forgotten already? Alphinaud told us that when we first met.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002830_DULIACHAI<tab>Allons, chéri, tu as la mémoire courrrte. <var 08 E905 ((Cette femme)) ((Cet homme)) /var> ac<var 16 /var>com<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>gnait Alphinaud, rappelle-toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>Um, actually, that may not have been... Never mind...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002840_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ce n'était pas le sens de ma question...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002850_YSHTOLA<tab>So, as you can see, you will not want for bodies. I trust you will have your design ready in good time for their arrival.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002850_YSHTOLA<tab>Très cher monsieur, toutes vos demandes ont été satisfaites. Alors maintenant, à vous de nous concevoir un beau talos géant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>Norvrandt is counting on you...heir to Daedalus Stoneworks.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002860_YSHTOLA<tab>Tout le monde ici a hâte de voir à l'œuvre le grand héritier de la Daedalus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002870_RYNE<tab>We'll be back as soon as we can─and we'll bring the whole world with us.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002870_RYNE<tab>Nous allons ramener plein de monde, promis. À plus tard<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...I take it we will be assisting Master Chai. Though I am quite sure he has everything under control...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002880_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Restons aux côtés de notre ingénieur en chef, tous les deux. Je sens qu'il va avoir besoin d'aide...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The future is where my destiny awaits...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002890_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah... C'est toi... Y a un problème<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>(GASP)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002900_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Forgive me, I was...lost in a dream.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002910_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Pardon, je m'étais assoupi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I needed some fresh air, and thought to rest for a moment. It would seem I am more fatigued than I realized.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002920_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>J'ai eu un petit coup de mou et j'ai voulu me reposer un peu, mais avec cette douce brise, j'ai fini par piquer du nez...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Too much time away from the tower, I fear. It drains me─leaves my body frail and weak.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002930_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il me semble l'avoir déjà expliqué, mais mon corps a tendance à défaillir dès que je m'éloigne de la Tour de Cristal.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though, in truth, it is debatable whether I can still call this my body...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Enfin, je ne sais même pas si je peux encore parler de corps au point où ça en est...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When first I turned my mind towards the salvation of the world, I came to the conclusion that it would take many long years. Many more than remained to me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je suis devenu comme ça bien avant d'avoir fondé Cristarium. À l'époque, je cherchais dé<var 16 /var>ses<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ré<var 16 /var>ment un moyen de sauver ce monde, et j'étais arrivé à la conclusion qu'une vie humaine n'y suffirait pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so I made myself one with the Crystal Tower, that I might live indefinitely.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002960_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>J'ai alors pris une décision qui allait bouleverser mon existence<var 1D /var>: j'ai fusionné avec la Tour de Cristal. J'en suis devenu une partie intégrante. C'était le seul moyen de me soustraire à ma condition de mortel.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am but an extension of it now. Hence my weakness the farther I travel, and the longer I am away.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tel que tu me vois, j'ai peut-être l'air humain, mais je ne suis en réalité rien de plus qu'un appendice de la tour. Voilà pourquoi je suis condamné à demeurer près d'elle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>It has been quite a journey.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tu sais... J'en ai parcouru, du chemin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But thanks to you, the end is in sight. My wish will finally be fulfilled.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_002990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, grâce à toi et tes amis, ma quête touche à sa fin. Mon vœu le plus cher sera bientôt exaucé...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>How goes the construction effort?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003000_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Au fait, la con<var 16 /var>struc<var 16 /var>tion du talos avance<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then this may be the last moment we have to ourselves for a while. Come, sit with me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003010_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il est bientôt terminé<var 1D /var>? Dans ce cas, c'est notre dernier moment de répit... Tu ne voudrais pas t'asseoir, qu'on discute un peu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tell me, when all of this is over, what will you do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bon, parle-moi de tes projets. Que comptes-tu faire une fois ce combat achevé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll settle matters with the Empire.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Reprendre la lutte contre Garlemald.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What I always do: seek out mightier foes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Chercher des adversaires à ma hauteur.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Rest awhile.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Prendre des vacances bien méritées<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A6_000_004_NONE_VOICE<tab>...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, yes. Even should we succeed in forestalling the Eighth Umbral Calamity, the specter of war will remain.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il est vrai que même si nous parvenons à écarter la menace d'un huitième fléau, la guerre, elle, sera loin d'être terminée...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But to declare your intent with such easy resolve... You truly are a heroes' hero, my friend.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je remarque au passage que tu n'as pas hésité une seconde avant de répondre... Un tel aplomb, c'est peut-être ça, la marque des vrais héros<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In the hundred years they have existed, no one had come close to ridding us of even a <var 1A 02 /var>single<var 1A 01 /var> Lightwarden. Yet already you yearn for the next challenge. You truly are a world apart from us all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, parce que les grands purgateurs ne te suffisent pas<var 1D /var>? Eux qui ont terrorisé la population pendant un siècle sans que personne n'ait pu les mater<var 1D /var>? Franchement, tu me fais peur, des fois...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That would be well deserved. You might consider roaming Norvrandt not as her savior, but as a simple sightseer. Viewed through such eyes, I am certain she would seem quite different.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003060_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>En voilà une bonne idée. Tu pourrais même t'attarder en Norvrandt, le temps de redécouvrir le continent sous un jour moins funeste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Well, you needn't hurry to decide. I was merely curious to know what sort of future lay in store for a hero with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> life ahead of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003070_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ne t'inquiète pas, tu as tout le temps d'y réfléchir. J'étais simplement curieux de connaître les aspirations <var 08 E905 ((d'une grande dame)) ((d'un grand homme)) /var> comme toi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But whatever it is you decide to do, I have every confidence that you will do well. For you have the strength to forge your own path.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003080_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Quelle que soit ta décision, je suis sûr que tout se passera bien. Tu trouves toujours des solutions, c'est ce qui fait ta force.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>You will leave countless lives better than you found them, and the souls you touch will never forget your kindness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003090_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Sans compter tous ces gens que tu as aidés et qui te sont redevables. Sois sûr<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> qu'ils ne t'oublieront pas de sitôt.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then, in trying times, when you question your worth and your choices, they will raise their voices to remind you of the difference you have made.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003100_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Si un jour le doute s'installe en toi, ils t'aideront à le chasser, en te disant combien ils t'admirent pour ta gentillesse et ton courage.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And thus will your deeds come to affirm your path. Remember this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tu sauras alors que le chemin que tu as arpenté était le bon... et tu iras de l'avant, le cœur léger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> do when this is over?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Et vous alors, qu'allez-vous faire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I would know more of you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Parlez-moi plutôt de vous, pour changer.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>When this is over... Indeed...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Hmm... Bonne question.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Of <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? You mean what I intend to do afterwards?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>De moi<var 1D /var>? Tu veux connaître mes motivations<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I once told you that there are things we can ill afford to lose.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>À vrai dire... Il y a cette personne que j'aimerais sauver plus que quiconque. J'en avais déjà parlé, t'en souviens-tu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>"Things,“ I said, though in truth I spoke of a person. One who is unaware of the full extent of my plans. Though he deserves to know, I have good reason to keep my counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Elle est toujours en vie à l'heure actuelle, mais... c'est compliqué. Je ne peux pas simplement la voir et mettre mes pensées à nu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>“Things,” I said, though in truth I spoke of a person. One who is unaware of the full extent of my plans. Though she deserves to know, I have good reason to keep my counsel.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Elle est toujours en vie à l'heure actuelle, mais... c'est compliqué. Je ne peux pas simplement la voir et mettre mes pensées à nu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I have come to terms with this in my mind, yet my heart yearns to lay everything bare. For <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is my inspiration, and I would give much and more for the chance to speak with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> as friends, with no thought of concealment.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>J'ai fini par m'y résigner. Néanmoins, j'aimerais vraiment pouvoir un jour lui ouvrir mon cœur, car je considère cette personne comme mon <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var> à moi.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Should <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> indulge me with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> tales, I would regale <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> with my own─about my efforts in Norvrandt, perhaps.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Écoute, puisque tu as l'amabilité de me tenir compagnie, je vais te dire comment j'envisage la suite des événements.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Though...ultimately, that tale is more yours than it is mine.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003190_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>D'abord, tu vas me faire le plaisir d'achever ce que j'ai commencé, et tant pis si je dois te laisser le beau rôle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then...I would ask <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> about <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> next adventure. And if <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> should wish me to be a part of it, oh...how happy it would make me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003200_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Lorsque ce monde sera enfin sauvé, j'irai à la rencontre de mon <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var>, et je me proposerai de l'accompagner dans son périple.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Together, we would travel the lands and cross the seas and take to the skies upon the eternal wind... My heart swells simply to imagine it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003210_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nous irons où le vent nous porte, parcourant le ciel, la terre et la mer en quête d'aventures toujours plus palpitantes. Ah, ce sera tellement exaltant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>But all of this is contingent upon our victory in the coming battle.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003220_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Bien sûr, il nous faut pour cela remporter le combat final, sans quoi ce beau projet restera à jamais une douce chimère.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The people of this world have entrusted their hopes to us. We cannot fail them.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003230_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Nous y arriverons, fais-moi confiance. Je me battrai pour que le rêve dont on m'a confié la charge devienne réalité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>...Nor those who roused me from my slumber.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003240_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Et je n'oublie pas non plus ceux qui m'ont sorti de mon long sommeil. Leurs espoirs ne seront pas déçus.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you for your company, my friend. Let us return to Amity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003250_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Merci encore pour ce brin de causette. Rentrons à Amistie, à présent.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>Word from the Exarch. All is set on his side, and we may proceed when ready.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003260_YSHTOLA<tab>L'exarque vient de m'appeler. Chai-Nuzz et les autres sont prêts à activer le talos.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003270_THANCRED<tab>Well, we have sufficient stone for our needs.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003270_THANCRED<tab>Niveau pierre, on a ce qu'il faut.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003280_URIANGER<tab>Likewise, preparations for the imbuing have been made according to thine exacting instructions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003280_URIANGER<tab>Les mages sont prêts eux aussi. Ils n'attendent que notre ordre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then you need only say the word!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003290_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alors ça y est...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>Let us begin. See that everyone is in position.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003300_YSHTOLA<tab>Il est temps de réveiller le talos<var 1D /var>! Guidez chacun vos ouvriers jusqu'à leurs postes. Que tout le monde se mette en position<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>We shall catch Vauthry, mountain and all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003310_YSHTOLA<tab>On va rendre une petite visite à Vauthry<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003320_CHAINUZZ<tab>Here it comes!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003320_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ça y est, ça commence<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003330_CHAINUZZ<tab>Hah hah! Yes! <var 1A 02 /var>Yes<var 1A 01 /var>! You've not lost your touch, you clever old bugger!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003330_CHAINUZZ<tab>Ouah, quel pied<var 1D /var>! Je savais bien que j'étais encore capable de prrrouesses<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003340_CHAINUZZ<tab>Do you see what they're doing!? If its hands are damaged, it won't be able to cling to the mountain! Oh, I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> this was a terrible idea!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003340_CHAINUZZ<tab>Hé, c'était pas prrrévu, ça... Ils sont en train de lui bousiller la main<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Vauthry marshals the eaters to his defense. This was only to be expected.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Soit ces purgateurs sont plus in<var 16 /var>tel<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>gents que la moyenne, soit c'est Vauthry qui les commande. Dans tous les cas, nous sommes dans le pétrin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>We must try and draw as many of them down to the ground as possible. It may not be enough, but we have no other choice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tout n'est pas encore perdu. Je vais dire à nos alliés d'essayer de les attirer au sol. En espérant que ça marche...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003370_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Is that─?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003370_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Là-bas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003380_FEOUL<tab>Such a heartless thing our sapling is! Cold and cruel and <var 1A 02 /var>heartless<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003380_FEOUL<tab>Ahhh<var 1D /var>! Un sans-cœur<var 1D /var>! Mon petit arbrisseau est un sans-cœur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003390_FEOUL<tab>Summon us in times of need, we <var 1A 02 /var>expressly<var 1A 01 /var> said─yet what should we find but the final battle joined without so much as a <var 1A 02 /var>whisper<var 1A 01 /var> of our name!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003390_FEOUL<tab>Je t'avais pourtant dit de m'appeler si tu avais des problèmes... Au lieu de ça, tu m'as délaissée tout du long, et même pendant la bataille finale<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003400_FEOUL<tab>Yes, yes, we may also have said that we fae folk have no interest in the struggles of men─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003400_FEOUL<tab>Bon, c'est vrai, je t'ai moi-même expliqué que le peuple féérique n'était pas du genre à obéir aux humains.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003410_FEOUL<tab>But if our <var 1A 02 /var>adorable<var 1A 01 /var> sapling had come crying to us for help, we would of <var 1A 02 /var>course<var 1A 01 /var> have flown to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> aid! Of course we would! What are we to do with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003410_FEOUL<tab>Mais c'est pas pour autant que ta jolie branchette va ignorer tes sanglots. Ceux de son pauvre petit arbrisseau en détresse<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est pas une sans-cœur, ELLE<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003420_FEOUL<tab>We are so very, very sad. <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> will play with us. <var 1A 02 /var>Cheer us up again<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003420_FEOUL<tab>Mon cœur saigne. Pour la peine, je vais me défouler sur vous.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Thank you, Feo Ul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Merci, Titania...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I think they're mad at me...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'ai les oreilles qui sifflent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>This I did not expect. But I will gladly accept the help.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003430_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Eh bien... Je ne m'attendais pas du tout à la voir, mais je suis bien content que son altesse Titania soit avec nous. Grâce à elle, le talos devrait tenir encore un peu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I will send word to Y'shtola and the others. Join them at the foot of Mt. Gulg and be ready to make the ascent!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003440_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Il n'y a plus une seconde à perdre. Le pied du Mont Gulg est au nord d'ici. Pars devant, je vais dire à Y'shtola et aux autres de t'y retrouver.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003450_ALPHINAUD<tab>The end is near, my friends. We have found Vauthry's hiding place.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003450_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ça n'a pas été de tout repos, mais nous y voilà. Il ne nous reste plus qu'à débusquer Vauthry.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003460_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Unrepentant villains. Will you not be satisfied until you have brought disaster down upon your own heads?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003460_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Bande d'idiots... Venir jouer les agitateurs au pas de ma porte... Vous tenez donc tant que ça à souffrir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003470_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)By your wickedness, you stand to gain naught but ceaseless conflict!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003470_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Je me défendrai jusqu'au bout... Qui sème la barbarie récolte une guerre sans fin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003480_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Had you only entrusted your fate to me, there would have been peace for all.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003480_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Et dire que vous auriez pu accepter ma bienveillance, et vous épargner tant de violences inutiles.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003490_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)You could have lived in bliss in my eternal paradise, free from the burdens of conscience and purpose!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003490_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Mon paradis vous tendait ses bras. Imaginez, un monde où le bien et le mal ont disparu, où il n'est plus besoin de chercher dé<var 16 /var>ses<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ré<var 16 /var>ment un sens à sa vie. L'éternelle félicité pour tous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Peace assumes many forms, and I do not doubt that you considered yours well worth the cost. I was even prepared to believe that the end might justify the means.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003500_ALPHINAUD<tab>C'est vrai. En un sens, tu avais réussi à créer une forme de paix. Je te l'ai toujours concédé, et c'est pour cela que je souhaitais qu'on te laisse la vie sauve.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ignorant as I was, I had hoped that you might mend your ways and join hands with us. That we might strive together for the happiness of all...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003510_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je te prenais pour un idéaliste tout comme moi, quelqu'un qui s'était fourvoyé en voulant faire le bien. À mes yeux, tu méritais une seconde chance.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003520_ALPHINAUD<tab>...But no more. Your actions cannot be reconciled with your words.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Mais j'ai changé d'avis depuis. Trop de fois, je t'ai vu contredire sans vergogne tes beaux discours.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003530_ALPHINAUD<tab>"Peace for all,“ you say, yet when you were threatened, your first act was to sacrifice your own people in order to save yourself.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003530_ALPHINAUD<tab>Tu prétends penser à ton peuple, mais tu n'as pas hésité à t'en servir comme bouclier pour t'enfuir lâchement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003540_ALPHINAUD<tab>If your paradise can be rebuilt so long as you alone survive, it exists not for the people. It exists solely for your twisted pleasure!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003540_ALPHINAUD<tab>Puis tu as clamé que tu recréerais ton paradis de zéro, preuve qu'il n'était pas destiné à tes sujets, mais à toi seul... Un petit paradis égoïste pour le tyranneau narcissique que tu es<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003550_RYNE<tab>Hear me, Vauthry. The people won't submit to your will. For we each have our own.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003550_RYNE<tab>Don Vauthry... Les habitants de ce monde ne sont pas vos esclaves, ni des pantins que vous pouvez manipuler à votre guise.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003560_RYNE<tab>I made a promise to a noble soul─a woman who saw fit to entrust me with her legacy─and I mean to keep it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003560_RYNE<tab>Il y a quelque temps, une personne bien<var 16 /var>veil<var 16 /var>lan<var 16 /var>te m'a confié les clefs de notre avenir. J'ai promis que je ne la décevrais pas, et c'est pour ça que je ne peux pas accepter de vivre dans votre illusion.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003570_RYNE<tab>Everyone who stands with us has something precious, something that they cherish and would die to protect.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003570_RYNE<tab>Il en va de même pour nos autres alliés... Chacun a ses propres souvenirs, ses propres convictions, ses propres êtres chers à protéger.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003580_RYNE<tab>They know their own hearts. They know what they want for this world.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003580_RYNE<tab>Je n'ai peut-être pas une grande expérience de la vie, mais je ressens leur force au plus profond de mon être<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003590_RYNE<tab>And by lending their strength to our cause, they have spoken!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003590_RYNE<tab>Dans ce combat, nous avons reçu l'aide de tant de monde... Tous ces gens se sont rangés à nos côtés, contre votre dictature<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003600_RYNE<tab>No matter how hard you may try to bend the world to your will, we will never yield!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003600_RYNE<tab>Même avec vos pouvoirs, vous ne pourrez pas nous soumettre à votre vision déformée de la justice. Nous résisterons encore et toujours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003610_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)<var 1A 02 /var>Silence<var 1A 01 /var>! Not another word!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003610_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Silence<var 1D /var>! Ça suffit, taisez-vous<var 1D /var>! Saletés de vandales, de quel droit osez-vous me faire la morale<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003620_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)You presume to lecture me? Insolent worms! You will learn your place!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003620_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Vous n'avez pas l'air de savoir à qui vous vous adressez... Je vais me faire un plaisir de vous remettre à votre place<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003630_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)With my true powers awakened, I will expunge you like the filth you are. Your demise will serve as a reminder to all─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003630_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Une fois que je vous aurai broyés de toute ma force, j'exposerai ce qui reste de vous sur la place publique<var 1D /var>! Au peuple ignare, vous servirez d'exemple<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003640_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)That <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> am the zenith of mankind and sin eater both, chosen to rule over creation by right of transcendence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003640_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Je me tiens au-dessus des purgateurs et des hommes. Ce monde m'a choisi pour être son souverain absolu. Il m'a accordé tous les pouvoirs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003650_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)My very existence is virtuous! I am perfect! <var 1A 02 /var>Immaculate<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003650_VAUTHRY<tab>(-Vauthry-)Par conséquent, tous mes actes sont des bienfaits. Ne vous en déplaise, je suis l'innocence incarnée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003660_YSHTOLA<tab>He seems disinclined to grant us an audience.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003660_YSHTOLA<tab>L'audience est levée, on dirait.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Find Vauthry. We will hold the eaters here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003670_ALPHINAUD<tab>Notre objectif est d'éliminer le grand purgateur. Nous allons vous ouvrir la voie, allez lui régler son compte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Come! Let's finish this!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003680_ALPHINAUD<tab>La guerre entre humains et purgateurs prend fin ici et maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003690_VAUTHRY<tab>Why? Why am <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> cast down...when it is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who are the villains?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003690_VAUTHRY<tab>Pourquoi... suis-je étendu au sol<var 1D /var>? Il y a erreur... C'est votre rôle, pas le mien...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003700_VAUTHRY<tab>Father told me...that I am hope. I am righteousness. That I am...a <var 1A 02 /var>god<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003700_VAUTHRY<tab>C'est mon père lui-même qui me l'a dit... “Mon fils, tu incarnes l'espoir, la bonté et la justice. Tu seras le prochain dieu sur terre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003710_VAUTHRY<tab>That is why I was born...as man and sin eater both...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003710_VAUTHRY<tab>... J'ai mis en toi la chair d'un purgateur afin que tu puisses accomplir ta destinée.“

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003720_VAUTHRY<tab>I kept the people safe! They respected me! Worshipped me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003720_VAUTHRY<tab>Le peuple me glorifiait, pourtant<var 1D /var>! Ah, c'est sûr qu'il était ravi de vivre sous mon toit, à l'abri des purgateurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003730_VAUTHRY<tab>How can this be? I should be the one...looking down at you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003730_VAUTHRY<tab>Las<var 1D /var>! Qu'en est-il à présent<var 1D /var>? Si seulement vous aviez accepté de vous soumettre... Que le diable vous emporte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003740_VAUTHRY<tab>Help me, damn you... I...am your god...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003740_VAUTHRY<tab>Toi... Aide-moi, vite... Je suis ton dieu...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Look! The sky!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003750_ALPHINAUD<tab>Regardez... Le ciel...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003760_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Fools! Were it not for my decisive action, the whole city would have been overrun! Razed to the ground!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003760_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>La populace est sotte et ingrate... Si cette cité est encore debout, c'est uniquement grâce à ma clairvoyance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003770_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Yet they dare to complain about casualties? Spare me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003770_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Et ils osent se plaindre qu'il y a eu trop de victimes<var 1D /var>!? On marche sur la tête<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003780_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>I'll wager they were put up to it by those wretches who seek to usurp me. They're stirring up the citizenry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003780_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>À moins qu'il ne s'agisse d'un vil coup monté par ceux qui convoitent mon trône...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003790_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>But if they think I will yield to the likes of them, they are gravely mistaken!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003790_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Oui, ce sont forcément eux... Ces salauds rêvent de ma chute... mais cela n'arrivera pas<var 1D /var>! Jamais de la vie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003800_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)To be subjected to such deplorable treatment... Such ingratitude! You have my sympathies, sir. You do so much good for this city, and you could do so much more, were you not surrounded by fools...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003800_EMETSELCH<tab>(-???-)Je compatis, Gouverneur. Que voulez-vous, c'est le fardeau des grands hommes d'avoir à justifier leurs actes auprès du petit peuple.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003810_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Who are you!? You're not supposed to be in here!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003810_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Qui êtes-vous<var 1D /var>!? Vous n'avez rien à faire ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003820_EMETSELCH<tab>My apologies for the intrusion, but I come bearing a proposal. One that will ensure the longevity of your reign.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003820_EMETSELCH<tab>Pardonnez ma hardiesse... En réalité, je suis venu vous faire une proposition.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003830_EMETSELCH<tab>But give me the word, sir, and I will bring hither a Lightwarden.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003830_EMETSELCH<tab>J'aimerais vous aider, vous et votre famille. Si vous êtes d'accord, j'irai capturer pour vous le grand purgateur qui vit dans la région.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003840_EMETSELCH<tab>By giving its power to the babe within your lady wife's womb, we shall create a transcendent being─a king to rule over all. And as sire to the king, your authority will never again be in question.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003840_EMETSELCH<tab>Nous l'utiliserons pour faire de votre futur enfant le souverain ultime, celui que personne n'osera plus défier. Grâce à sa toute-puissance, vous pourrez à loisir asseoir votre autorité.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003850_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Haha! Amazing! Before my Vauthry, they behave as docile pets!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003850_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Magnifique, c'est tout simplement magnifique<var 1D /var>! Grâce au monstre rattaché à mon fils, les purgateurs lui obéissent comme de gentils petits toutous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003860_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>With this gift, my line shall be guaranteed power for perpetuity! We shall rule the whole world!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003860_OLDEULMOREMAYOR<tab>Avec un tel pouvoir, mon clan n'aura plus à craindre ni pour son prestige ni pour ses privilèges. Et bientôt, nous aurons le monde dans le creux de notre main<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003870_EMETSELCH<tab>By all means, sir. United under Eulmore's banner, men will cease fighting and abandon their ambitions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003870_EMETSELCH<tab>Un beau programme... Je prédis pour ma part que les hommes cesseront de guerroyer. Qu'il n'y aura plus de progrès, mais une stagnation durable et paisible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003880_EMETSELCH<tab>Thus they will grow fat and complacent, and in their sloth seal your supremacy...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003880_EMETSELCH<tab>Un monde baigné de Lumière, c'est tout le bien que je vous souhaite... pardon, que les Asciens vous souhaitent...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003890_ALISAIE<tab>Are you all right!? S-Say something!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003890_ALISAIE<tab>Hé, tu m'entends<var 1D /var>!? Est-ce que ça va<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>Twelve forfend, he cannot contain the Light. He's beginning to turn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003900_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh non... Il a accumulé trop de Lumière. Si ça continue, il va se transformer en purgateur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003910_YSHTOLA<tab>Twelve forfend, she cannot contain the Light. She's beginning to turn!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003910_YSHTOLA<tab>Oh non... Elle a accumulé trop de Lumière. Si ça continue, elle va se transformer en purgateur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003920_YSHTOLA<tab>Urianger! If you've aught up your sleeve, now is the time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003920_YSHTOLA<tab>Urianger, tu as forcément prévu ce cas de figure<var 1D /var>!? Dis-nous ce qu'on doit faire, vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003930_RYNE<tab>It's changing back!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003930_RYNE<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! La Lumière<var 1D /var>! Elle revient dans le ciel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The combined power of every Lightwarden is too terrible a burden for any one soul to bear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003940_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Le moment de vérité est arrivé. Toutes les énergies des grands purgateurs ont été réunies au même endroit.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And so I shall relieve you of it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003950_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Laisse-moi te soulager de ce trop-plein d'énergie.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003960_ALISAIE<tab>Exarch!? What are you doing!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003960_ALISAIE<tab>Exarque, qu'est-ce que vous faites<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I will channel this profusion of power to the Crystal Tower and use it to travel to other worlds.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003970_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ugh... Je vais rediriger toute cette énergie vers la Tour de Cristal... et me téléporter avec elle dans un autre monde<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As I have dreamed of doing ever since I first learned of their existence!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003980_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>À compter du jour où j'ai appris l'existence des reflets, je n'ai vécu que pour cet instant...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Who would choose to remain here, in this dying realm, when they might go elsewhere and begin anew? Not I. And thus...thus did I <var 1A 02 /var>use<var 1A 01 /var> you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_003990_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Je voulais couler des jours heureux, ailleurs que sur cette terre maudite... alors, je me suis servi de toi<var 1D /var>! J'ai profité de ta naïveté<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004000_RYNE<tab>No... No, I don't believe you! It doesn't make sense!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004000_RYNE<tab>Impossible... Pendant tout ce temps, vous comptiez nous trahir<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004010_ALISAIE<tab>Damn you! We won't let you do with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> as you please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004010_ALISAIE<tab>S'il croit qu'on va le laisser se ficher de nous, il se fourre le doigt dans l'œil<var 1D /var>! Attrapons-le<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004020_URIANGER<tab>Do not interfere!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004020_URIANGER<tab>Restez où vous êtes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004030_URIANGER<tab>Please! I beseech you all! <var 1A 02 /var>Let him go<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004030_URIANGER<tab>Il a pris sa décision... Je vous en conjure, juste pour cette fois... n'intervenez pas.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004040_YSHTOLA<tab>You knew of this, Urianger.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004040_YSHTOLA<tab>Je commence à comprendre... Urianger... tu étais au courant de son plan depuis le début, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004050_YSHTOLA<tab>'Tis all a fiction. Such vaguely defined acts of teleportation stand no chance of success.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004050_YSHTOLA<tab>Une téléportation aussi hasardeuse n'a aucune chance d'aboutir. Même s'il le voulait, l'exarque ne pourrait pas atteindre un autre monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004060_YSHTOLA<tab>The Exarch will never live to see another world─as he knows only too well.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004060_YSHTOLA<tab>Et il le sait pertinemment. Il est en train de cacher délibérément ses véritables intentions à notre ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Then...what does he mean to do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Je ne comprends pas...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004080_YSHTOLA<tab>He means to take the Light with him into the rift...where he will die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004080_YSHTOLA<tab>En réalité, il compte se rendre dans l'interstice qui sépare les mondes... Il va emmener toute cette Lumière là-bas... et disparaître avec elle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004090_YSHTOLA<tab>He means to take the Light with him into the rift...where he will die.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004090_YSHTOLA<tab>En réalité, il compte se rendre dans l'interstice qui sépare les mondes... Il va emmener toute cette Lumière là-bas... et disparaître avec elle.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004100_YSHTOLA<tab>From the beginning, he intended to sacrifice himself to save our friend and Norvrandt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004100_YSHTOLA<tab>En clair, il va donner sa vie pour sauver notre ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>, pour sauver Norvrandt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>At journey's end, an opportunistic thief makes off with the hero's prize.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004110_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>“Alors que nos héros s'apprêtent à célébrer leur victoire, voilà qu'un petit malin vient jouer les trouble-fête.”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>A paltry way to end a chapter, I concede.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004120_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>C'est une façon comme une autre de conclure un récit...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Yet your tale will continue, and my role in it will scarcely be remembered.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004130_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Tu verras, un jour, tu en riras. Après tout, ton histoire à toi est encore loin d'être achevée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Worry not. Whatever should become of me, I will be happy and free, safe in the knowledge that I have played my part.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004140_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ne sois pas triste. Tu ne perds pas grand-chose, juste un pauvre type dont tu ne connais pas le nom... Alors haut les cœurs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que faites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Remain silent.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A9_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ne rien dire

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Call him by his name.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A9_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>L'appeler par son nom

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you for fighting for this world. For believing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004150_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Merci d'avoir cru en l'avenir, et de t'être battu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour ce monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Fare you well, my friend─my inspiration.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004160_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Adieu, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Adieu, mon <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thank you for fighting for this world. For believing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004170_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Merci d'avoir cru en l'avenir, et de t'être battu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour ce monde.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Fare you well, my friend─my inspiration.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004180_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Adieu, mon ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Adieu, mon <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004190_EMETSELCH<tab>Only those who possess the Royal Eye of the Allagan imperial line are capable of controlling the Crystal Tower. Such individuals do not exist in the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004190_EMETSELCH<tab>Seuls les détenteurs de l'œil vermillon, les véritables descendants d'Allag, sont capables de contrôler la Tour de Cristal. Ce qui exclut d'office tous les habitants du premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004200_EMETSELCH<tab>Therefore, in all likelihood, the Exarch arrived here with the tower. This much I had surmised, yet I could not discern his grand scheme.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004200_EMETSELCH<tab>Cet homme a traversé les mondes... peut-être même le temps. J'étais curieux de connaître la finalité de son petit manège...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004210_EMETSELCH<tab>To think that he went through all this trouble for the sake of a single hero. It's almost admirable in its absurdity.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004210_EMETSELCH<tab>Dire qu'il voulait simplement sauver son idole... J'en frissonne tellement c'est risible.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004220_EMETSELCH<tab>Alas, it is not your grand scheme that will succeed, but ours.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004220_EMETSELCH<tab>Désolé, mais nous avons déjà des projets pour ce monde. Tu peux garder le tien.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004230_THANCRED<tab>You bastard!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004230_THANCRED<tab>Emet-Selch... espèce d'ordure<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004240_EMETSELCH<tab>Stay put. Your friend is still alive, but whether he remains so depends on you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004240_EMETSELCH<tab>Du calme, mes mignons. Votre ami l'exarque respire encore... Ce serait dommage de m'obliger à l'achever, non<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004250_EMETSELCH<tab>What a disappointment you turned out to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004250_EMETSELCH<tab>Ahhh là là... Je suis déçu, mais à un point...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004260_EMETSELCH<tab>I placed my faith in you. Let myself believe that you could contain the Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004260_EMETSELCH<tab>Je caressais l'espoir que tu absorbes toute cette Lumière sans défaillir, et regarde dans quel état tu es... C'est pathétique, on dirait que tu vas devenir un monstre d'un instant à l'autre.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004270_EMETSELCH<tab>But look at you now, halfway to becoming a monster. You are unworthy of my patronage.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004270_EMETSELCH<tab>La messe est dite, semble-t-il. J'étais naïf d'attendre davantage d'un être humain raté.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What do you intend to do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A10_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Pourquoi<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It was you who created Vauthry, wasn't it?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A10_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>C'est toi qui as créé Vauthry, avoue<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004280_EMETSELCH<tab>(SIGH)
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004280_EMETSELCH<tab>(soupire pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment)

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004290_EMETSELCH<tab>I am an Ascian. My heart's sole desire is to usher in the Great Rejoining.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004290_EMETSELCH<tab>Je suis un Ascien, ai-je besoin de le rappeler<var 1D /var>? J'existe uniquement pour permettre l'unification des mondes.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004300_EMETSELCH<tab>A hundred years ago, I entrusted my comrade Loghrif with the task of increasing Light's sway over this world. This we sought to do by manipulating heroes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004300_EMETSELCH<tab>Il y a un siècle, j'ai chargé mon camarade Loghrif de manipuler les héros de l'époque afin d'intensifier la Lumière dans le premier reflet.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004310_EMETSELCH<tab>When that failed to achieve the desired result, I created Vauthry.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004310_EMETSELCH<tab>Hélas, ce plan n'a pas abouti, il a donc fallu que j'en échafaude un nouveau. C'est ainsi que Vauthry est né.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004320_EMETSELCH<tab>But thanks to your meddling, that too has ended in failure.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004320_EMETSELCH<tab>En fin de compte, lui aussi aura la<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment échoué. Tout cela à cause de vous...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004330_ALPHINAUD<tab>What was your true purpose in approaching us?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004330_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ça ne nous dit pas pourquoi vous vous êtes rapproché de nous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004340_EMETSELCH<tab>By your Twelve, boy, have I not told you before that everything I said was the truth?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004340_EMETSELCH<tab>Il me semble vous avoir déjà répondu maintes fois à ce sujet. Vous savez, je ne vous ai jamais menti sur mes intentions.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004350_EMETSELCH<tab>You were specimens by which I might gauge man's potential as it stands.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004350_EMETSELCH<tab>À mes yeux, vous constituez un bon échantillon de l'espèce humaine actuelle. Grâce à vous, je peux évaluer son potentiel physique et mental et prendre mes décisions en conséquence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004360_EMETSELCH<tab>I genuinely had an interest in you. Genuinely considered taking you on as allies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004360_EMETSELCH<tab>L'intérêt que je vous porte n'est pas feint, croyez-moi. À vrai dire, il m'est même arrivé de penser que nous pourrions devenir alliés.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004370_EMETSELCH<tab>Provided <var 1A 02 /var><var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var><var 1A 01 /var> could contain and control the Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004370_EMETSELCH<tab>Mais pour cela, il aurait hélas fallu que votre champion<var 08 E905 ((ne)) (()) /var> arrive à absorber et à contenir en <var 08 E905 ((elle)) ((lui)) /var> toute la Lumière des grands purgateurs.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004380_EMETSELCH<tab>If not then <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>─and by extension you─would be of no use to me. 'Twas as simple as that.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004380_EMETSELCH<tab>Désolé, mais je n'ai aucun intérêt à m'associer avec quelqu'un de faible, que je dois constamment tenir par la main.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004390_THANCRED<tab>So we've been found wanting. How disheartening.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004390_THANCRED<tab>Tu nous mettais à l'épreuve depuis tout ce temps, et on a échoué, c'est ça<var 1D /var>? J'ai rarement entendu quelque chose d'aussi prétentieux et égoïste.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004400_THANCRED<tab>But even had we fulfilled your conditions, there was no guarantee that we would cooperate. What then?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004400_THANCRED<tab>De toute façon, personne ici n'aurait eu envie de manger dans la main des Asciens, quand bien même on aurait réussi ton test.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004410_EMETSELCH<tab>Then I simply kill you all. At the very least, it would restore the world to the way it was before you went about trouncing Lightwardens willy-nilly.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004410_EMETSELCH<tab>Dans ce cas, il m'aurait suffi de vous tuer. L'énergie que votre ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> a accumulée aurait de nouveau jailli sur le monde, et nous serions revenus au statu quo, ni plus ni moins.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004420_EMETSELCH<tab>Suffice it to say it would be most inconvenient to have all that Light taken away─and I would be lying if I were to claim his actions didn't have me worried.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004420_EMETSELCH<tab>Tout me va, tant que la Lumière ne quitte pas le premier reflet. Je dois avouer que votre exarque m'a fait une petite frayeur avec son plan farfelu.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004430_EMETSELCH<tab>Hm, you still retain your form and your senses...but you have all but become a sin eater.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004430_EMETSELCH<tab>Hmm... Tu as beau lutter pour préserver ta conscience et ton apparence humaine, ta mutation en purgateur est déjà bien entamée.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004440_EMETSELCH<tab>Whether you will it or no, your mere existence will serve to engulf the world in Light.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004440_EMETSELCH<tab>À partir de maintenant, tu vas par ta simple présence inonder ce monde de Lumière, que tu le veuilles ou non.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004450_EMETSELCH<tab>Those in your company will likewise turn into sin eaters, and in time you will succumb to your base instincts and hunt innocents to feast on their sweet, sweet aether.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004450_EMETSELCH<tab>Devenu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> une bête assoiffée d'éther, tu iras t'en prendre à des populations innocentes. Certaines de tes victimes deviendront des monstres à ton image.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004460_EMETSELCH<tab>Those few with the will left to fight may rise up against you. But before your absolute might, they will quickly know despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004460_EMETSELCH<tab>Oh, l'humanité ne se laissera pas faire, non... Les habitants de ce monde prendront les armes contre toi bien assez tôt. Mais tu les écraseras avec une implacable force. Pour eux, ce sera le désespoir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004470_EMETSELCH<tab>"There is no hope! We are finished! <var 1A 02 /var>Mankind<var 1A 01 /var> is finished!“
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004470_EMETSELCH<tab>“Nous n'avons aucune chance de gagner... C'est la fin... Les hommes sont veules et impuissants<var 1D /var>!”

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004480_EMETSELCH<tab>Ahhh, the irony. What Vauthry achieved through bliss, you will achieve through despair.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004480_EMETSELCH<tab>Quelle ironie... C'est finalement toi qui vas leur imposer l'état de stagnation que recherchait Vauthry, non pas en les plongeant dans la béatitude, mais dans une détresse sans fin.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004490_EMETSELCH<tab>But I have overstayed my welcome. I shall look forward to seeing you bring the world to its knees, hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004490_EMETSELCH<tab>Sur ce, tu as un monde à piétiner, et moi d'autres chats à fouetter. Si tu veux bien m'excuser...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004500_ALPHINAUD<tab>Exarch!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004500_ALPHINAUD<tab>L'exarque...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004510_EMETSELCH<tab>I have naught to show for all the time and effort I invested in you. He is a small token for my troubles.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004510_EMETSELCH<tab>Je vais le garder en guise de lot de consolation. C'est que je n'ai pas gagné grand-chose à vous côtoyer, finalement.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004520_EMETSELCH<tab>I did not expect that I could learn aught from man, but I may yet learn something from all the knowledge he had hoarded for his precious hero.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004520_EMETSELCH<tab>J'ai toujours pensé qu'il n'y avait rien à apprendre d'humains défectueux, mais celui-ci a accumulé une telle somme de con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces au profit de son <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var> que je devrais y trouver mon compte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004530_EMETSELCH<tab>I pity you, I do.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004530_EMETSELCH<tab>Pauvre de toi...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004540_EMETSELCH<tab>Your friends are now your foes. If you do not kill them, they will kill you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004540_EMETSELCH<tab>Tes amis d'aujourd'hui seront tes ennemis de demain. Le moment venu, vous vous entretuerez.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004550_EMETSELCH<tab>When it all becomes too much to bear, seek me out at my abode, in the dark depths of the Tempest.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004550_EMETSELCH<tab>S'il te reste un semblant de conscience et que tout cela est trop douloureux pour toi, viens à ma rencontre. Je te tiendrai compagnie et nous pourrons rire ensemble de ton calvaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004560_EMETSELCH<tab>There, you may complete your descent into madness with some dignity, far from prying eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004560_EMETSELCH<tab>Ma demeure repose dans les profondeurs de l'océan obscur, dans un lieu baptisé La Tempête.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004570_EMETSELCH<tab>Till then, I bid you farewell...eater.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004570_EMETSELCH<tab>Je t'attendrai, mon cher monstre...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah. Finally.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004580_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ah, enfin réveillé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_Q11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Was it just a dream?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A11_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>J'ai rêvé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>What happened?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_A11_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Que s'est-il passé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You're confused, and small wonder.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004590_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Tu dois avoir l'esprit embrouillé. Pas étonnant après ce qu'il s'est passé.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004600_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>After you collapsed, Emet-Selch vanished.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004600_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Emet-Selch a enlevé l'exarque du Cristal, puis il a disparu, juste après que tu as perdu con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004610_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Then Ryne did what she could to stay the raging of the Light within your body.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004610_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ryne s'est précipitée à ton chevet et t'a prodigué les premiers soins... Je veux dire par là qu'elle a empêché la Lumière de causer plus de ravages dans ton corps.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004620_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Thanks to her, you're still you, but she's only delayed the inevitable.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004620_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Elle a réussi à stabiliser plus ou moins ton état. Mais elle ne s'est attaquée qu'au symptôme, pas à la maladie. En clair, tu n'es pas tiré<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> d'affaire.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004630_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>You're not going to like what you see, but you still need to see it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004630_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Voilà où nous en sommes...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004640_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>It's like this all over. The whole of Norvrandt is shrouded in Light again.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004640_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>La situation est la même partout<var 1D /var>: sur l'île de Kholusia, à Rak'tika, en Amh Araeng, en Il Mheg... Norvrandt baigne à nouveau dans une clarté permanente.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004650_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>And it's because of you and the power you absorbed from the Wardens.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004650_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>C'est la présence du réceptacle de la Lumière des grands purgateurs qui cause ce phénomène... Ta présence.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004660_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>No one knows but your friends.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004660_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Tes camarades sont les seuls au courant.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004670_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>When they carried you down from the mountain, they told everyone waiting below that they didn't understand why the Light had returned.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004670_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Ils t'ont transporté<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> jusqu'au pied de la falaise, et ont dit aux gens là-bas que la Lumière était revenue “pour une raison inconnue”.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004680_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>And now they're out there trying to allay the people's fears while searching for a way to save you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004680_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>En ce moment même, ils font le tour de Norvrandt pour tenter d'apaiser la population, tout en cherchant un remède au mal qui t'affecte.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004690_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>If you're well enough to be up, you're well enough to get some fresh air. Better that than stewing in here. Go on. Go.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05004_004690_WARRIOROFDARKNESS<tab>Si tu as la force de marcher, je te conseille d'aller faire un tour en ville. Ça te fera plus de bien que de rester ici à te torturer les méninges.
